definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 can1 guan3 zheng4 hou4 qun2
Ji2 bo2 te4 shi4 zheng4 hou4 qun2
man4 xing4 pi2 lao2 zheng4 hou4 qun2

definition: carpal tunnel syndrome (pain in the hands due to pressure on the median nerve)/median neuropathy at the wrist
pinyin: wan4 sui4 dao4 zheng4 hou4 qun2

sentences.english: Gifted children can appear to have the same behaviours as those with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 天才儿童会出现一些与亚斯普杰氏症候群相同的行为。

sentences.english: However, as the world is too quiet, and not in line with the wishes of Juesao syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 但那样世界太安静了，不符合狂燥症候群的意愿。

sentences.english: This kind of issue is usually a symptom of a deeper problem.
sentences.chinese: 这种形式的问题通常是更深层次问题的症候。

sentences.english: Myofascial pain syndrome is frustrating to patients and clinicians.
sentences.chinese: 肌筋膜疼痛症候群是令人沮丧的病人和医生。

sentences.english: Sam, aged six, is just one of around 60 people in Britain with congenital central hypoventilation syndrome (CCHS), which means he often stops breathing.
sentences.chinese: 现年6岁的Sam患有先天中枢性换气不足症候群。

sentences.english: She was diagnosed with systemic lupus erythematosus complicated by hemolytic uremic syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 狼疮并发生溶血性尿毒症候群。

sentences.english: Os acromiale is a rare predisposing factor of shoulder impingement syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 肩峰小骨是引起肩夹击症候群的罕见原因。

sentences.english: Homesickness is a distinct adjustment disorder with identifiable symptoms
sentences.chinese: 思乡是一种具有明显症候的适应性障碍病。

sentences.english: The disease modulating drugs (DMD's) do NOT reduce symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 药物疾病模式并没有减轻症候。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the causes for misdiagnosis of cardiovascular syndrome during peri- menopause.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨围绝经期妇女心血管症候群的误诊原因。

sentences.english: I feel within me the manifest prognostics of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我肚子里有明显的消化不良症候。

sentences.english: Shoulder impingement syndrome is one of the most common painful shoulder disorders.
sentences.chinese: 肩夹击症候群是一种常见的疼痛性肩关节疾病。

sentences.english: The hallmark biochemical feature of refeeding syndrome is hypophosphatemia.
sentences.chinese: 低血磷是复食症候群的生化检验特征。

sentences.english: Carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) is caused by compression of the median nerve in the carpal tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 腕管症候群是由于正中神经在腕部受到压迫所造成。

sentences.english: Well, the by-product of not responding to the Self is symptomatology.
sentences.chinese: 是这样的，不能对自性作出反映的结果是症候群。

sentences.english: He could easily have been diagnosed with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 但他很容易就会被确诊为亚斯普杰氏症候群。

definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
superficial syndrome/illness that has not attacked the vital organs of the human body
deficiency of yin 陰|阴[yin1] in TCM
